title: Chocolate layer tart
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '45g unsweetened cocoa powder', '175ml hot water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 (23cm) unbaked shortcrust pastry cases', '250g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '200g caster sugar', '115g butter', '3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '250ml milk']
